description: .NET Standard client implementation for VSoft Mobile Workforce REST API
releaseNotes:
Methods related to user and system management were added:
- Diagnostic methods: GetApplicationLogs, GetWorkQueue, GetSynchroQueue
- System settings management: GetSystemSettings, UpdateSystemSettings, PatchSystemSettings, GetSystemSettingsConstraints
- Mobile users workdays: GetWorkdaysOrNull, UpdateWorkdays, DeleteWorkdays
- Mobile users days off: GetDaysOff, AddDaysOff, DeleteDaysOff

ReportType field indicating if a report is partial or final was added to data returned by the GetReportOrNull method.

Task relations were added. Each task can specify multiple relations to other tasks.
Relations are stored in the task data Relations field.
Additionally ReverseRelations field was added to the data returned by GetTaskOrNull. The field contains information about other tasks referencing given task.

- TaskAddData.Relations and TaskUpdateData.Relations fields were added.
- TaskData.Relations and TaskData.ReverseRelations fields were added.
- TaskData.ScheduledDate field was added

- TaskData.RequestedDate field containing pending scheduled date change request was added
- RequestTaskReschedule method was added. This method can be used to change scheduled date of an already active task.
After this method is called the mobile user will be asked to accept a new date. If user accepts the change ScheduledDate field is updated and RequestedDate field is cleared.

Webhooks support were added. MobileWorkforce can notify your system about various events with a webhooks mechanism. You can add a webhook through the web panel.

- The CancelTask method will return properly formatted response when trying to cancel a not existing task.
